game.title: Find the Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of the pirate captain.
game.description: The pirate captain's treasure is said to be hidden on a remote island. The only clues to its whereabouts are in his journal, which you must find and decipher.
game.reward: The pirate captain's treasure, rumored to be worth a fortune.

task.description: The pirate captain's journal is hidden in a cave on the island. Locate and search the cave thoroughly.
The captain's journal is written in a code. Clues to the code are found in the library of the island's governor.
With the journal deciphered, you'll know the treasure's location. Travel there and search for it.
